scripts.build:all: npm run build:wasm:release && npm run build:rxp:all
scripts.build:rxp:all: npm run bundle && npm run bundle:min && npm run build && npm run build:worker:prod
scripts.build:wasm:release: cd ./src/parsers/manifest/dash/wasm-parser && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && node ../../../../../scripts/wasm-optimize.mjs target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/mpd_node_parser.wasm ../../../../../dist/mpd-parser.wasm && cd ../../../../../ && npm run wasm-strip
scripts.check: npm run check:types && npm run lint
scripts.check:all: npm run check:types && npm run lint && npm run lint:demo && npm run lint:tests && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:memory && node -r esm ./scripts/check_nodejs_import_compatibility.js
scripts.check:appveyor: npm run check:types && npm run lint && npm run lint:demo && npm run lint:tests && npm run test:appveyor
scripts.check:demo: npm run check:demo:types && npm run lint:demo
scripts.test:appveyor: npm run test:unit && npm run test:memory

Build a demo page (e.g. to test a code c.start: Build the "full" demo (with a UI) with the non-minified RxPlayer and serve it on a local server. Re-build on file updates.
Build a demo page (e.g. to test a code c.start:wasm: Build the "full" demo (with a UI) with the non-minified RxPlayer including the DASH WebAssembly MPD parser and serve it on a local server. Re-build on file updates.
Build a demo page (e.g. to test a code c.demo:min: Build the demo and minify it in demo/bundle.js
Build a demo page (e.g. to test a code c.demo:watch: Build the demo in demo/bundle.js each times the files update.
Build a demo page (e.g. to test a code c.check:demo: Check the validity of the full demo directory by running the type checker and linter on it
Build a demo page (e.g. to test a code c.check:demo:types: Check TypeScript types in full demo files
Build a demo page (e.g. to test a code c.lint:demo: Run linter on the full demo files
Build a demo page (e.g. to test a code c.standalone: Build and launch the "standalone" demo (without any UI) on a local server. Re-build on file updates.
Build a demo page (e.g. to test a code c.certificate: Generate a certificate to be able to use HTTPS locally for the demo pages (`npm run start` and `npm run standalone` will then listen to HTTPS requests through a communicated port)

Type-check or lint the current code.check: Check the validity of the src directory by running the type checker and linter on it
Type-check or lint the current code.check:all: Check the validity of the whole project by running linters, type checkers and every tests
Type-check or lint the current code.check:types:watch: Check TypeScript typings in src each time files change

Integration tests (test the whole API).test:integration: Launch integration tests in multiple browser environments
Integration tests (test the whole API).test:integration:chrome: Launch integration tests in a Chrome browser.
Integration tests (test the whole API).test:integration:chrome:watch: Launch integration tests in Chrome each times the files update
Integration tests (test the whole API).test:integration:coverage: Launch integration tests in multiple browser environments and produce a coverage report in tests/integration/coverage
Integration tests (test the whole API).test:integration:firefox: Launch integration tests in a Firefox browser.
Integration tests (test the whole API).test:integration:firefox:watch: Launch integration tests in Firefox each times the files update

Unit tests (test particular functions).test:unit:coverage: Launch unit tests and produce a coverage report

Memory tests (test memory usage to avoid.test:memory:chrome:watch: Launch memory tests in Chrome each times the files update

Regular builds (used by JS bundlers).build: Build the rx-player and create corresponding files and directories.

Legacy bundle builds (single-file bundle.bundle:min: Build the player and minify it in dist/rx-player.min.js
Legacy bundle builds (single-file bundle.bundle:min:watch: Build the player in dist/rx-player.js each times the files update
Legacy bundle builds (single-file bundle.bundle:watch: Build the player as a minified version in dist/rx-player.min.js each times the files update

Worker builds (relied on in \"multithrea.build:worker: Build the RxPlayer's worker code when running in "multithread" mode, in a development context.
Worker builds (relied on in \"multithrea.build:worker:prod: Build the RxPlayer's worker code when running in "multithread" mode, minified and some checks removed, used for a release.

WebAssembly MPD parser builds (needs Rus.build:wasm:debug: Build the DASH MPD parser written in rust as WebAssembly into debug mode, and output the result as dist/mpd-parser.wasm
WebAssembly MPD parser builds (needs Rus.build:wasm:release: Build the DASH MPD parser written in rust as WebAssembly into release mode, and output the result as dist/mpd-parser.wasm

Combinations of multiple builds.build:all: Perform all possible builds of the player (regular RxPlayer builds, legacy bundles and the WebAssembly DASH MPD parser release build).
Combinations of multiple builds.build:rxp:all: Perform all possible builds of the RxPlayer main code (that is, excluding the WebAssembly DASH MPD parser build).

Build the documentation pages.doc: Generate the HTML documentation in doc/generated/pages

Make a release.releases:dev: Produce dev npm releases (which are tagged pre-releases on npm) with the code in the current branch
Make a release.update-version: Update the version to the string given in argument (example: `npm run update-version 3.8.0`). Will update the codebase and perform every builds.
